metadata.feature_description: Handles friendly URLs and URL rewriting during crawling operations.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify SEO URL Rewriting Settings Accessible

steps.action: Navigate to Settings > SEO in persona bar
steps.expected: SEO settings page with URL Management options loads
steps.actual: SEO page loaded with URL Management tab showing URL Rewriter and URL Redirects settings

steps.action: Navigate to TEST URL tab in SEO > URL Management
steps.expected: Test URL interface with URL rewriting test section appears
steps.actual: Test URL tab displayed with 'TEST A PAGE URL' and 'TEST URL REWRITING' sections

steps.action: Enter friendly URL 'http://localhost:8081/en-us/Our-Products' and click Test URL Rewriting
steps.expected: URL should be rewritten to internal DNN format with TabId parameter
steps.actual: URL successfully rewritten to 'Default.aspx?TabId=22&language=en-US'. Identified Language: en-US, Identified Page: Our Products, Operation Messages: ActiveTab: 22/Our Products IsSecure: False

steps.action: Check 'Redirect to Friendly URLs' setting in SEO > URL Management > General Settings
steps.expected: Redirect to Friendly URLs toggle should be ON
steps.actual: Redirect to Friendly URLs is enabled (ON). URL Rewriter settings visible including Standard Replacement Character ('-'), Concatenate Page URLs (ON), Set Default Site Language (ON)

steps.action: Navigate to a page using friendly URL format
steps.expected: Page loads successfully using friendly URL
steps.actual: Page loaded at http://localhost:8081/en-us/Our-Products - friendly URL format working correctly

observations: The URL Rewriting Support is an internal/backend feature primarily used by the Search Crawler during crawling operations
The UrlRewriter.cs code reads rewrite rules from SiteUrls.config file and applies them during URL processing
Spider.cs uses UrlRewriter.RewriteUrl() when 'UseFriendlyUrls' host setting is enabled, converting friendly URLs to internal TabId-based format for indexing
The SEO > URL Management interface provides comprehensive URL rewriting configuration including replacement characters, case conversion, and redirect settings
The TEST URL feature allows administrators to verify URL rewriting is working correctly without running a full crawl
